about_the_game:
Experience a new short story about becoming the President of the USA. And do it for free!

It was a twist of fate that made you assume the powers of the presidency and try to fill your predecessor's shoes. Now you have an international crisis on your hands, artists went on strike over A.I., and you found out that the US infrastructure is crumbling.
Try to overcome adversities and take your rightful place in the history books.

Things to do:
  • Talk with politicans,
  • Read and answer emails,
  • Take part in conferences,
  • Use Screecher,
  • Sign laws,
  • Write speeches,
  • Read about public opinion.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (Windows 10N NEEDS Media Feature Pack)
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: .NET Framework 4.8 (32-bit), Windows 10N needs installed Media Feature Pack
